name: Sir Farmalot: A Retired Evil OverLord
name_original: Sir Farmalot: A Retired Evil OverLord
description:
Made for Lartu's mini-RPG game jam, The game is very incomplete but still fun.

I might update it in the future. 

Controls:

Left Click to Attack

Right Click: to Move

1, 2, 3 to Plant Trees

R to Respawn

Story:

Oh yeah

I'm Sir Farmalot

and I just farm a lot

I used to be an evil persona 

but now I have a farm!

Have fun!
